venue.name: Microsoft New England Research and Development Center

item.description:
Genius Bar (Toolbox): 

We will have a Genius Bar set up for help with WordPress-related issues. James Coletti & Kurt Eng will run this session, as well as anyone else who would like to volunteer their time providing user support. Interested in helping? Contact us!

Volunteers:

  • Ken Gagne (@kgagne)
  • Jerry Johnson (@jmiloj)
  • Erick Hitter (@ethitter)

WordPress Actions & Filters (Dev/Design): 

"Filters Are For More Than Making Coffee"

Presented by Gregory Cornelius (@gcorne)

Every plugin author knows the basics of actions and filters, but do you know the “nitty-gritty”? This month's meetup will dig into the various ways actions and filters can take your themes and plugins to the next level. Along the way, get a taste of the CMS that drives over 400 Boston University websites and various tips from one of the project’s lead developers. Intermediate WordPress or PHP experience recommended.
item.why: Genius Bars have been heavily requested & we're lucky to have a talented WP developer presenting on Actions & Filters, the core of the WordPress Plugin API. Always great to have advanced, developer-centric topics from time to time!
item.name: BWPM Feb 2011: Genius Bar (Toolbox) & Actions & Filters (Dev/Design)
